title: Romeo and Juliet
creator_credit: George Cukor, Irving G. Thalberg and Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer
brief_description: This lavish production of Shakespeare’s Romeo and Juliet features Leslie Howard and Norma Shearer as the star-crossed lovers. Cast also includes John Barrymore, Edna May Oliver, Basil Rathbone, C. Aubrey Smith, Andy Devine.
